title: Automatic decompilation from Assembly x86
content:
Is there a tool to automatic decompile an assembly x86 code?
What I need is a tool where I simply paste my code and it returns C code.
Thanks

answers_data.content: I'm not sure exactly what you mean by "automatic", but you could always assemble your code, then run it through a decompiler to get your pseudocode C output. This answer details a way to do this entirely from the browser.
